structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Findings necessary for proposed map amendment -- Reconsideration.

text.section: The planning commission, legislative body, or fiscal court may adopt provisions which prohibit for a period of two (2) years, the reconsideration of a denied map amendment or the consideration of a map amendment identical to a denied map amendment.

law.history: Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 21, effective July 15, 1986. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 325, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 198, sec. 1. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 172, sec., 34.
